name: first_seen
description: First seen time of the user

name: ltv
description: Life time value of the user

name: no_of_conversions
description: No. of conversion events done by the user, Conversion Goal can be modified in settings page.

name: last_seen
description: Last seen time of the user

name: no_of_sessions
description: No.of sessions done by the user

name: campaign_name
description: Name of the campaign advertisement through which the user installed the app.

name: publisher_name
description: Name of the Publisher through which the user installed the app.

name: install_status
description: Current status of the user, If the user has the app installed on his device.

name: uninstall_time
description: Time when our system found a user has uninstalled the app.

name: device_reinstall
description: Tracked when a reinstall is detected on a device.

name: user_reinstall
description: Tracked when an identified user has reinstalled the app.

name: push_opt_in_status
description: Push permission status of a user on iOS device.

name: web_push_subscription_page_url
description: Page URL of the web page on which a user subscribed to web push. Use it to find where the susbcriptions are happening on your website or categorize your subscribers to send targeted notifications

name: web_push_subscription_status
description: Denotes the web push subscription status of a user - True / False. Use it to find your aggregate subscribers and users who unsubscribed after subscribing once.

name: sms_subscription_status
description: An attribute which stores the SMS subscription status of the user. This will be used to see if a user is reachable based on certain values of the attribute.

name: last_known_city
description: This attribute is based on user’s last known probable location

name: last_known_country
description: This attribute is based on user’s last known probable location

name: last_known_pincode
description: This attribute is based on user’s last known probable location

name: last_known_state
description: This attribute is based on user’s last known probable location

name: hard_bounce
description: Denotes if emails to the user have hard bounced

name: spam
description: Denotes if the user has reported an email as spam

name: unsubscribe
description: Denotes if the user has unsubscribed from an email

name: advertising_identifier
description: Advertising Identifier of the device on which the app is installed.

name: mobile_user
description: Denotes if user accessed the website on mobile.

name: browser_details
description: Browser details of web user includes - Platform, Browser, Manufacturer

name: locale_country
description: Country of the user derived from device locale settings. for eg. United States. This is a standard attribute where name is provided by Digo Engage and the value is provided by client

name: locale_language
description: Language of the user derived from device locale settings. for eg. English. This is a standard attribute where name is provided by Digo Engage and the value is provided by client

name: creation_source
description: Denotes the source through which a user was created. This is a standard attribute where name is provided by Digo Engage and the value is provided by client

name: email
description: Email address of the user. This is a standard attribute where name is provided by Digo Engage and the value is provided by client

name: first_name
description: First Name of the user. This is a standard attribute where name is provided by Digo Engage and the value is provided by client

name: gender
description: Gender of the user. This is a standard attribute where name is provided by Digo Engage and the value is provided by client

name: last_name
description: Last Name of the user. This is a standard attribute where name is provided by Digo Engage and the value is provided by client

name: phone_number
description: Mobile Number of the user. This is a standard attribute where name is provided by Digo Engage and the value is provided by client

name: customer_id
description: Unique Id that the app has set for a user. This is a standard attribute where name is provided by Digo Engage and the value is provided by client

name: location
description: Latitude and Longitude of the user. This is a standard attribute where the name is provided by Engage 3.0and the value is provided by the client.

name: birth_date
description: Birth date of the user. This is a standard attribute where the name is provided by Engage 3.0 and the value is provided by the client.

name: name
description: Full Name of the user. This is a standard attribute where the name is provided by Engage 3.0and the value is provided by the client.

name: sms_subscription_status
description: SMS Subscription Status of the user. This is a standard attribute where the SMS Subscription Status is tracked based on the user's subscription preferences.
